title: Hextech Key
body:
I recently made a thread and someone told me that the hextech key will reset every 30 days (the drop rate), but its been a pretty long time and I don't think its reset yet? Can someone check it out for me, like when it will reset? Thanks!


{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Hextech key fragments have a high drop rate but is based on a curve, meaning that it slowly drops the more you earn them.  That will reset approximately every 28 days, per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  There's no specific time period, you just gotta hang in there and they'll start raining down again.  Rest easy!
